plot: A helpless father strives to find the killer of his son. A drama reveals the social status of those unprivileged people and their struggles to make a living and fights for justices in China today.
title: Dad's Promise
plot_es: A helpless father strives to find the killer of his son. A drama reveals the social status of those unprivileged people and their struggles to make a living and fights for justices in China today.
plot_en: A helpless father strives to find the killer of his son. A drama reveals the social status of those unprivileged people and their struggles to make a living and fights for justices in China today.
